org.apache.paimon.casting

Class CastRulePredicate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.paimon.casting.CastRulePredicate

  • public class CastRulePredicate
extends Object
    In order to apply a CastRule, the runtime checks if a particular rule matches the tuple of input and target type using this class. In particular, a rule is applied if:
    1. getTargetTypeRoots() includes the DataTypeRoot of target type and either
      1. getInputTypeRoots() includes the DataTypeRoot of input type or
      2. getInputTypeFamilies() includes one of the DataTypeFamily of input type
    2. Or getTargetTypeFamilies() includes one of the DataTypeFamily of target type and either
      1. getInputTypeRoots() includes the DataTypeRoot of input type or
      2. getInputTypeFamilies() includes one of the DataTypeFamily of input type
